events.text: May, 20. Russian army takes control of Mariupol’s Azovstal steel plant
May, 17. Ukraine’s military declares the end to the Azovstal operation in Mariupol
May, 1. Evacuations for civilians were carry out from the Azovstal steel factory in Mariupol. Around 100 civilians was being evacuated.
Mar, 16.The Russian Armed Forces bombed the Drama Theatre in Mariupol, Ukraine. It was used as an air raid shelter during the siege of Mariupol.
Mar, 9.The Russian Air Force bombed Maternity Hospital No 3, a hospital complex functioning both as a children's hospital and maternity ward in Mariupol.
Mar, 5. Russian forces shell evacuation corridor from Mariupol.
Mar, 1. Siege of Mariupol have started. It was announced that DPR forces has almost completely surrounded the nearby cities and Mariupol.
